name: Bunny Business Prototype
description:
Before there was Iyo, there was Benedykt.

Bunny Business Prototype is the precursor to the Bunny Business game. It is a simple adventure shop game where you shoot up things for ingredients, convert them into Raboids, and sell those Raboids to customers. You have just inherited a Raboid shop, a Mama bunny, and a portal to another world from your grandfather. How you deal with them is up to you.

Shoot up things to collect ingredients! Collect ingredients to feed Mama Bunny to create Raboids! Sell them to lots of people.
